The Site

The site is basically created when exploring jekyll framework. After I played enough, I decide to build a website with it for several functionalities:

  • 1. Sales Page
Just as most personal site did, to display my personal achievements for coming opportunities...
  • 2. Mixture of Things
Serve as a mixture platform for projects archive, personal news, online portfolio and blogs.
